Processes and how to find and kill

  • To find the pid of the process, do 
    pidof processname

    or,

    ps aux | grep processname
  • To kill process with pid 
    kill pid
  • To kill stubborn unresponsive process 
      kill -9 pid
  • To kill all processes with name 
    killall processname

    or

    killall -9 processname

Example: Unmounting partitions in use: Find out which process is using it by lsof | grep /mountpoint Then kill it using

  killall/kill [-9] processname/pid

This project is maintained by debdeepbh
